favourite.article: Herr ich liebe nur dich und es gibt niemanden so wie du Im ganzen Universum, hab ich niemanden wie dich Herr Jesus, ich liebe dich Te amo Senor Jesus!!!
주님 나는 당신만을 사랑합니다. Junim Nanun Danshinmanryu Saranghapnida!! Lord, I Just love You. お主よ、わたしは あなただけ愛します。
Te amo, mi Señor. No hay nadie como tú.
Amen.
Lord, gain every room in my heart for the accomplishment of Your will. May Your heart's desire be my heart's desire. Lord Jesus I love You.

Lord Jesus thank You that You are a great Shepherd. No matter what our situation is, it is only You who can supply, sustain, strengthen and comfort us all the way Lord. Lord Jesus, I just love You and there's no one like You Lord.

Lord Jesus, at the end of the day, the end of the month, Lord Jesus, I just want to thank You. Lord Jesus, You led me through all these days, Lord Jesus, the coming days are all Yours. Lord Jesus, may You make me a crazy lover of You. Lord, I just love You, and there's no one like You.
This song has brought me from being merely a 'crazy lover of Jesus' to just loving Him.

Señor te amo a Ti Y no hay nadie como Tu En el universo No tengo a nadie como Tu Te amo mi Hesus
I've been searching for the Spanish lyrics of this hymn. I praise the Lord that I found one in YouTube and I am posting it here. This is one of my favorite hymns and I always sing it to the Lord. I love You Lord Jesus! I cannot live without You!
Lord I just love You. Don't let us be wasteful. Lord, let us redeem the time. O Lord Jesus, we treasure our teenage years. We just love You.
Thank You for Your love, Lord Jesus...
It's so nice.
Amen! Lord Jesus I just love You. ♥
Lord I just love You, in the whole universe I have no other one like You, Lord Jesus I just love You.
Lord, I just love You. Thank You for loving me.
Lord I just love You. I love You Lord Jesus...
Love to sing this song in Spanish and wish you add the Spanish words here.
Lord Jesus we love You because You've loved us first. May we live our days like this loving our most precious One. Amen.
Lord, I just want to love You from the innermost part of my being. Amen.
May the Lord really gain me so that I can love Him more. He is the most beautiful One. Amen.
Lord Jesus we love You and there's no one like You. Come Lord Jesus!
Lord may this become the prayer of all your children so that You may gain what You've always wanted: a BRIDE! Lord Jesus I love You. You're so beautiful to me!
Lord Jesus, I love You!
I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS!
Dearest Lord, I just love You!

This song has to be one of the songs that the redeemed ones will sing for eternity! In the whole universe I have no one like You.....Its beauty is found in its simplicity. Lord, I just love You! I have been refreshed in my first love to the Lord this morning by singing this in a fresh way to Him! Thank You Lord for giving such experiences to all the saints for the building up of Your Body!

This song made me realize how much I love the Lord. It made me realize how much I miss Him and long for Him. I love the Lord Jesus. How could I not. Through this song I have fallen in love with the Lord again. I realize what a wonderful person He is. Lord Jesus I love You.
Lord, I really love You.....
This song draws me more closer to the Lord. And makes me realized of how great His love for me is and that He deserves to be loved back with the love of Christ.
oh my... i'm gonna cry... for I have been touched by the Lord Lord I Love YOU!!!!!!!
Lord Jesus there is no one like You, for Your beauty exceeds all others. Lord, WE ARE CAPTIVATED BY YOUR BEAUTY! LORD WE LOVE YOU!!!!!!!
Oh Lord Jesus, I love You so much. No matter what I do to turn myself away from You because of my wrongdoings, You are still pulling me back. Lord, You are my miracle.
Lord, I just simply love You with no reasons.
This is a wonderful song. It's just like a prayer. Lord Jesus there is no one in this universe like You. Lord Jesus I Love You.
I love this simple yet full of meanings hymn, Which stir up my love toward the Lord, who is my dear beloved bridegroom, and He is worth our love.Amen.

whenerver i hear this song, i can't just control my eyes from shedding tears...this song keeps on reminding me that i need to love the love the Lord with my very best love... LORD, i just want to you and You alone!!
the love of the lord,nothing compares of all the things in this world..praise the lord..amen

I will never forget singing this song acappella outside with all the young people as the sun was setting during a blending time in Berkeley. I felt that I really touched the Lord that day in such a sweet and intimate way!
I love this song coz it reminds me to love the only one great God w/c is our Lord Jesus Christ..amen
Everytime I heard this song, I got renewed and wanted to stop doing anything and just love Him. I feel like I am resting in the very heart of my most lovely one.
I love this song because it reminds my first love unto Lord.....oh how sweet to love the LORD! MAY WE ALL GIVE OUR WHOLE BEING UNTO HIM!!
I really like the song because it reminds me to love the only One worthy of my love... LORD JESUS...

When I listen this song, I really feel something strange in my deepest part, I don't know what it is but I think is the Lord who's say me that I am a slave and I need to give myself to Him and love more and more.

This song just causes me to love the Lord so much. it keeps on reminding me who owns my heart now. Even if my love for the world comes back, this song just revives my love for the most lovely One and gains my heart once again for Him.

I'm so glad that I am in the Lord's recovery. I don't have to do anything but just love Him desperately.
The Lord doesn't want us to do many things or anything for Him. He wants us to keep in contact with Him, dating with Him and be deeply in love with Him.
Although this song is simple and easy, but........ it means a lot to those who serve Him and love Him.
It reminds me to love Him more... "Lord, I love You. I just love You." Amen.

I have always enjoyed singing this song because it just reminds me of who matters the most in my life. Sometimes I'm so stuck in the world, and I forget who I am. This song reminds me of the One I love most, and relights my love for the Lord again and again. I don't need to do anything, I just need to love Him. Lord, I just love You!!
